q: Tuesday.`` This should be a scandal to every American. The time has come to deny all federal funding to the Planned Parenthood Federation of America,'' said Mike Pence , referring to the group as the largest abortion provider in America. On Wednesday, the powerful House Appropriations Committee said it wants to cut the budget for family planning programs by$ 327 million-- the exact sum requested by Democratic Barack Obama for such programs in his 2011 budget

Allen Iverson 's first game since Dec. 16 wasn't easy for the 34-year-old guard. Once I got my second wind I was all right. The first couple minutes I thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest, said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds.
